content: Staff not receiving CC charge emails.

comments.content: Collin, one of my staff members, says since the new admin went live he is no longer receiving the emails when his clients charge their CC. Can we fix that?

Rich, when CC is charged only adpad-UI and card processing bg services are involved. Admin panel is never involved in this process. 

Would you confirm that same is happening with other staff members as well?

correct...the credit card refill email should go to:

Client
sales@ezanga.com
beth@ezanga.com
Staff Member

I know once does not have to do with the other, but he is just saying that since the new admin went live that he noticed this issue.
Started working on this.

Rich,

1) Do you want to remove other email addresses configured in the past besides the above mentioned addresses? Following are those addresses 

  • rich@ezanga.com 
  • eli@ezanga.com 
  • mdonahue@ezanga.com 

2) Do you want to set same email addresses for all the CC mails?
When a credit card recharges it does go to the user and rich, eli and matt.  But it also needs to go to the staff member that is assigned.  Is that what you have?

Yes, by updating the recipient list CC notification email will be delivered to following emails.

  • rich@ezanga.com 
  • eli@ezanga.com 
  • mdonahue@ezanga.com 
  • Client
  • sales@ezanga.com
  • beth@ezanga.com
  • Staff Member

Please confirm.
You can remove "sales@ezanga.com" as everyone is already in there.
ok, done.

content: Campaign Traffic Bucket Score - Point of Concern

comments.content:
I have a concern and question Regarding Campaign Traffic Bucket.

At current all campaigns are by default set to as Account level as highlighted in pictures Attached (18-Mar-15 7-25-02 PM cp traffic bucket default screen.jpg).

 

Possible case of concern

If a user for a particular campaign removes a default Account level option and set his filters say as “Conversion” and does not check any options in the bucket type he can update his campaign and the system will not prompt user to select any options listed below see image (18-Mar-15 7-34-11 PM CP traffic buket.jpg). Also if user removes filter check from Minimum Bid tab (mistakenly or intentionally) see image (18-Mar-15 6-11-16 PM min bid tab.jpg). He will no longer gets his ads publish on selected campaigns since traffic score will get no value from the source. The click URL will look like this there is no place for empty traffic score(highlighted in bold) and eventually adds will not get published

http://192.168.0.31:20000/util/query.pl?kw=prime&src=&ua=&ts=1,1,1&mt=ppc&ip=71.203.237.212&ad=0&prod=0&na=20

 

Suggestion:

We need to prompt user to select at least one Campaign bucket option  if Bucket zero is not selected in Min Bid  tab.



Please put your feedback and valuable suggestions

What options should be selected if user select other options other than default.

attachments.name: 18-Mar-15 7-25-02 PM cp traffic bucket default scree.jpg

comments.content:
Let's make this a bit easier.  With regards to "Scoring Methods" we currently list:

Adometry
BS Score
Conversions

Adometry was bought by Google, so that is no longer needed.
Conversions was using a different 3rd party filter, which we no longer use.

so the only "Scoring Method we use would be BS Score".  However, on the Min Bid tab we changed how 3rd party scoring methods would work.

So we can change "BS Score" to "Traffic Buckets" for Account Level and for Campaign Level.

The Add Zero Bucket check box, will remain as an Account level setting for now, this way only Managers can add or remove that, and Sales Staff cannot touch that.

Does that help?

content: Converting User to staff and staff back to user - Vice Versa

comments.content: In V4 admin we have added a new functionality in user list page where a normal user can be transformed to staff user by selecting option "Convert to Staff user" from drop down. However once user changed to staff user it cannot be removed or disabled from staff privileges even after you select user back to "Convert to User". The selected user remains appearing as a staff in Manage user page.
okay, but put check only somename@eznaga.com allowed to be a staff member.
What about if an affiliate outside from ezanga is given access to admin panel?
only @ezanga.com
@Noman, we can add further urls along with ezanga.com, in future when needed.
@Amin, We need to alter the code for that.
